subject: Re order #SSN4928
description_text: Hello, I purchased the above and paid an extra charge for express shipping as it was purchased as a gift and your website stated the item was ready for shippig from the 15th of December as needed in time for Christmas; however, I still haven't received a dispatch email. Can you please let me know the shipping status of this item and when I can expect to receive it thankyou

conversations.body_text: Hi teresa jones,  We apologize for the delay; the warehouse in Germany is temporarily out of stock. Your order is expected to begin delivery next week.

Hi I'm very disappointed with this as when my order was placed there was stock and I also paid extra for an expedited delivery which I have not had nor was I informed of the stock delay.

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
